channel.title: Password System?
channel.description: So yesterday me and my friend as a joke were looking through runescape's job application section and we came across developer. As crappy RS coders we applied thinking we would be immediately denied but to our suprise they sent us an email with a form. The form included some work and I thought of this: A password system in which it automatically checks host/ip/computer or even better yet fingerprint/eye scanner for us with the advanced computer accessories :p Just an idea but i thought of implementing it into an rsps which would be SUPER cool. Thoughts/ideas?

item.title: Password System?
item.dc:creator: @_s11 s1gma
item.description:
@_s11 wrote:

[quote=“t4, post:20, topic:444306”][quote author=s1gma link=topic=546998.msg4014601#msg4014601 date=1339520169]

OR
You could make a password system in which the user can make a password that is longer than 4 characters and less than 12 characters. It should also be hashed when saved, preferably in an SQL database.
^The competent solution

why would you want to use a large, scale SQL database? a key, value structure seems a lot better suited here.
[/quote]i’d say demonstrating your ability to use a database would be advantageous for proving yourself to a company that likely uses a lot of them. no need to go overboard on it, just demonstrate that you know when to use one

but for this task a key, value structure is far faster and lightweight. a good example of a well-known/used structure is bdb. i understand your point, though.[/quote]even employing bdb is still proof that you know when to use a database, which is very probably one of the main things they’re looking for.

Read full topic

item.title: Password System?
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

You should require the users to write a 1000 words essay to identify themselves. You submit a handwritten text in the login screen and a Jagex employee will read it and then evaluate how likely that you wrote it (Based on style, content and handwriting). If it is accepted you will gain access.

As a bonus you would reduce boting, as few would be able to write consistent enough to get access on several users at the same time.

Read full topic

item.title: Password System?
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:

You could make a password system in which the user can make a password that is longer than 4 characters and less than 12 characters. It should also be hashed when saved, preferably in an SQL database.
^The competent solution[/quote]
why would you want to use a large, scale SQL database? a key, value structure seems a lot better suited here.

item.title: Password System?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

It’s an idea, but impractical. What if I want to login on a network that I’ve never been on before. Or if all of my fingers get severed, or I go blind! What then?

As long as people practice the “normal” security measures, it shouldn’t be a problem.

And then think about all of the paranoia. Your fingerprints/iris patterns being kept in some database…

Read full topic

item.title: Password System?
item.dc:creator: @tranomo tranomo
item.description:
@tranomo wrote:

i use a fingerprint scanner for my laptop, i have to say that’s the worst rsps idea i’ve ever heard of, and of the 30 minutes i’ve been on this forum i’ve seen some pretty stupid ideas.

Read full topic

item.title: Password System?

item.description:

Barely any player will have access to the hardware required to make this possible. Maybe in a few years.

item.title: Password System?

item.description:

Why the fuck would I want to have to scan my eye just to eat a damn shark?

Hmmm, you applied on the jagex website right?
[/quote]
Yeah but we got denied after email asking of our coding past :P[/quote]

you’re better off having an algorithm that has a result that mutates over time to generate a password… sort of like WoW.

item.title: Password System?
item.dc:creator: @Demolitionx711 Demolitionx711
item.description:
@Demolitionx711 wrote:

Just an idea, it would be cool for bank accounts such as paypal mentioned above and for a private server, you could even implement a voice recognition that would be very cool. I think that could be found somewhere online, it’s already implemented into several things. I will say i know several people with fingerprint scanners and microphones.

Read full topic

item.title: Password System?
item.dc:creator: @Not_a_bot Not_a_bot
item.description:
@Not_a_bot wrote:

+1 best idea yet on this forum. I suggest you round up your fellow RS coders and start a business plan to getting every RS player a fingerprint scanner, or even better yet contact PayPal and try to pitch the idea to them. Surely they would jump on board with this! Good luck.

Read full topic
